a.title: IHS Chorus in New York City

img.alt: IHS Chorus in New York City

div.p: The Ishpeming Public School District is a small district located in the heart of Michigan’s Upper Peninsula. Our current student population grades K-12 is over 700. The district consists of one elementary school, a middle school and a high school. Our highly dedicated staff takes pride in offering a challenging curriculum in an environment conducive to learning.

The people of Ishpeming have always desired a quality education for their children. In 1868, a year before Ishpeming was incorporated as a village, a charter to form a school district was granted. This support for education in our community has continued into a second century of excellence. The ongoing mission of our district is to prepare all students to be self-motivated, responsible, and productive citizens in a rapidly changing world.

Are you a prospective student or a parent of one? See what we have to offer! To complete an application for non-resident student enrollment, also known as schools of choice, download and view application.

a.title: Free Breakfast and Lunch for 18 Years and Younger

div.a: Free Breakfast and Lunch for 18 Years and Younger
div.div: We will be offering a free sack Breakfast and Lunch for any child 18 and younger. Adult meals are available for purchase for $4.00. The Breakfast will include a breakfast item, fruit and drink. The sack lunch will include a sandwich, fruit, veggie and a drink. Breakfast and Lunch bags can be picked up together between 11:00AM and 1:00 PM. Multiple days can be picked up at once. Location for Pick up will be the Pearl Street entrance.
div.a: Read More About Free Breakfast and Lunch for 18 Years and Younger

div.div: The Ishpeming Public School District is proud to announce that the Bellamy Brothers will be performing at the W.C. Peterson Auditorium on October 24, 2020. See the attachment to become a sponsor of the show, and receive preferred seating. Remaining seats will become available in the spring of 2020, for $35 per seat.
div.a: Read More About Bellamy Brothers Performance
